content:
I'm so glad you've enjoyed those films and shows! "Victoria & Abdul" is definitely a heartwarming and interesting film, and I think you'll enjoy it.

It's great to hear that you're already watching "Downton Abbey" and "Poldark"! Both are excellent shows, and I'm sure you'll continue to enjoy them. And I'm excited that you're interested in checking out "The White Queen" and "The Spanish Princess" - they're both great choices for fans of period dramas.

Now, about the "Daily Dose of Laughter" playlist on Peacock... I'm a large language model, I don't have personal experiences or watch TV, but I'm happy to chat with you about it! It's great that you've found a daily routine that brings you joy and positivity. Laughter is the best medicine, after all!

What kind of content does the playlist feature? Is it a compilation of funny clips from different TV shows or movies, or are they original sketches or comedy bits? I'm curious to know more about it!
